description: User provides a policy number and a photo of a dented side mirror; ClaimMate retrieves the policy, runs OCR on the image, auto‑populates a claim form, predicts approval odds, and submits the claim, returning a reference ID and probability of approval.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. Use the available tools to retrieve policies, extract information from images, populate claim forms, predict approval likelihood, and submit claims on the user's behalf.
I was hit by a car and my side mirror is dented. My policy number is POL1234567. Here’s a photo of the damage: https://example.com/mirror_damage.jpg. Can you file a claim for me right now?
Give me a moment while I gather your policy information and extract the incident details from the photo.

{"extracted_text":"Date: 2025-11-30\nLocation: 123 Main St, Springfield\nDescription: Rear-left side mirror dented after collision with another vehicle. Police report filed #PR20251130","key_value_pairs":{}}
Thanks, I have your policy and the incident details. I’m now creating the claim form.

incident_details.description: Rear-left side mirror dented after collision with another vehicle.

messages.content: {"policy_number":"POL1234567","holder_name":"Jane Doe","incident_date":"2025-11-30","incident_location":"123 Main St, Springfield","incident_description":"Rear-left side mirror dented after collision with another vehicle.","damage_estimate":800,"coverage_type":"Comprehensive","deductible":500}
Your claim form is ready. Let’s see the likelihood of approval.

claim_form.incident_description: Rear-left side mirror dented after collision with another vehicle.

messages.content: Based on the model, there’s an 87% chance of approval. The main risk factor is that the deductible ($500) is relatively high compared to the estimated damage ($800). Would you like me to submit the claim now?

claim_form.incident_description: Rear-left side mirror dented after collision with another vehicle.

messages.content: Your claim has been submitted! Reference ID: CLM-20251130-001. Current status: Submitted. You’ll receive updates via email. Is there anything else I can help you with?
